Abstract: Ric Burns, documentary filmmaker, believes that in 21st century New York City should convert an entire city block into a 'metropolitarium' dedicated to education (S)
Snippet: Ric Burns, documentary filmmaker, believes that in 21st century New York City should convert an entire city block into a 'metropolitarium' dedicated to education (S)
LeadParagraph: RIC BURNS, director and co-writer of ''New York: A Documentary Film''

Headline.Main: VISIONS: CITIES - Manifestoes To Give City A New Edge; 'The Metropolitarium'
